_header: Now bloweth the fruit that late began to spring
_description: ‘Banna Sanctorum’, in the South English Legendary

BodAddC38.First Lines:
NOu blometh þe nuwe frute þat late bigan to
                    spryngeþat to his kynde heritage mankynde shal
                    brynge…
BodAddC38.Last Lines:
…þat suffred wikked men al quyk her lymes to tereTelle i
                    wil bi rowe of hem as her daies falle in þe ȝeere

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Now bloweþ þis newe fruyt þat late bigon to
                    springeÞat to his kuynde heritage monkunne schal
                    bringe…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffurst biginne at ȝeres day for þat is þe furste
                    festeAnd fro on to oþur so arowe þe while þe ȝer wol
                    leste
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
NOW bloweyȝ þe newe frutÞat late bygan to
                    spriyngeÞat to his kynde eritageMannekynde shal
                    brynge…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…ffirst bygynneȝ at ȝeresdayffor þat is þe
                    firste festeAnd fro on to oþere by roweWhiles þe ȝer
                    will leste
BodLauMis463.Note: Written in half-lines because in two columns.

BodTan17.First Lines:
NOw bloweth þe frut þat late began to springeThat to his
                    kynde heritage man kynde schal bringe…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…ffirst begynneþ þe ȝeris dai for it is þe
                    firste festeAnd so from on to oþer whil þe ȝer wil
                    laste

OxfCCC431.First Lines:
now bi gunneþ þat nywe frut þat late gan to spri[
                        fore-edge ]Þat to oure kunde heritage mankunde schal
                    bryng…
OxfCCC431.Last Lines:
…furst bygunne at ȝeres day for þat is þe furste
                    festeamp; fro on to an oþer þe wile þe ȝer wole
                    leste
OxfCCC431.Note: Portion of text lost due to mutilation of leaves.

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Now blomeȝ þis new froyte þat late began to
                    springeÞat to his kynde Eritagh al mankinde sal
                    brynge…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Cristendam vs aght to lufe þat so dere was boghtWith
                    þe herte blode of ihesu criste þat þe spere to soght

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Nou blouweþ þe niwe frut þat late bygan to
                    springeþat to is kunde eritage mankunne schel
                    bringe…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Verst bygynneþ at ȝeresday for þat is þe
                    uerste festeAnd fram onto oþer so areng þe wile þe ȝer
                    wol leste

CamFitzMc128.First Lines:
…And thes oþer martirs ek that our lordes knyȝtes
                    werThat shedd her blod for cristendom that it no peryshed
                    nere…
CamFitzMc128.Last Lines:
…ffirst begynne at ȝeres day for that is the first
                    festAnd from oon to other so on rew whil the ȝer wil lest
CamFitzMc128.Note: Begins imperfectly due to loss of folios,

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Now bloweþ þis nywe ffrute þat late by gun to
                    spryngeÞat to his kynde heritage mankyn shal
                    bringe…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…ffurst by gunne at nywe ȝeres day ffor þat is þe
                    fferste [ ] ffesteAnd ffram on to oþer a rewe þe while þe
                    ȝer wole yleste

CamTCC605.First Lines:
Now bloweþ þe nywe frut þat late by gan to
                    springeÞat to his kunde eritage mankunde schal
                    brynge…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…furst by gynneþ at ȝeresday for hit is þe furst
                    feste& fram on to anoþer so aronk þe wile þe ȝere
                    wole leste

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
Nou bloweþ þe newe frut þat late by gan to
                    spryngeþat to is kunde heritage man kunne sscal
                    brynge…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Ferst by gynneþ at ȝeres day for þat is þe
                    ferste festeAnd fram on to oþer so a rewe þe wyle þe
                    ȝere wol yleste

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: NOw bloweþ þis nwe fruyȝt þat late bigan to springeþat to ys lunde eritage mankunde schal bringhe…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …verst bygynne atte ȝeres day for þat is þe ferste festeffram on to oþer so arawe þe wile þe ȝer wol leste

BLEge1993.First Lines: Now bloweþ þis newe fruit þat late bigan to springeþat to is kunde eritage man kunne schal bringe…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Vurst bigyn at s andreu þat is þe furste festeAnd vrom on to oþer arewe þe wiche þe [....]

Lam223.First Lines:
NOw bloes þe newe fruyt þat late bigan to springeÞat
                    to his kynde heritage men shal bringe…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…ffirste biginne at ȝeres day for þat is þe first
                    festeAnd from oon to oþer so on a rowe þe whyle þe ȝere
                    wole leste
